meanings.definition: A city or town, especially one considered in relation to its social and cultural life.
meanings.sent1: The urbs was bustling with people going about their daily lives.
meanings.sent2: We visited the urbs to experience the vibrant culture and history.
meanings.sent3: The urbs seemed to have a personality of its own, full of stories waiting to be told.
meanings.sent4: In the heart of the urbs, time seemed to stand still, preserving its ancient charm.
meanings.sent5: The urbs was like a living, breathing organism, constantly evolving and adapting.

meanings.definition: The central part of an ancient Roman city.
meanings.sent1: Exploring the ruins, we discovered the remains of the urbs where the ancient Romans lived.
meanings.sent2: The urbs was once the bustling center of Roman life, now a silent witness to history.
meanings.sent3: In the ancient urbs, even the stones seemed to whisper tales of bygone days.
meanings.sent4: The urbs stood as a symbol of Roman power and ingenuity, a testament to their legacy.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the ancient urbs, one could almost feel the echoes of the past reverberating.
